name: Greg Robert
description: I am a honest and very loving man. I am caring and want the best for my partner. I have been married once. I am an average looking guy honest, trimmed beard don’t look or act my age so I have been told many times. I cannot tolerate liars and false people. I love beaches and travelling. I am into sports, like watching them on tv. I would like to meet someone who is honest down to earth with view to forming a serious relationship; someone i will grow old with and who is easy going.
